thread.title: Signature Packaging Ranks 91 on Black Enterprise 100 Largest Black Businesses 2015
thread.title_full: Signature Packaging Ranks 91 on Black Enterprise 100 Largest Black Businesses 2015 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Signature Packaging Ranks 91 on Black Enterprise 100 Largest Black Businesses 2015
text:
Signature Packaging & Paper, LLC
JACKSON, Mo. , Oct. 15, Signature Packaging & Paper, LLC, a full service corrugated manufacturer announces being recognized, for the first time, on Black Enterprise magazine's listing of the nation's 100 largest black businesses for 2015. Companies on this list represent the best of the best in enterprise and innovation in industries including industrial/service, auto, advertising, and financial services . These companies are helmed by some of the top talent in management, acquisitions and leadership.
"We are honored to join Black Enterprise's 2015 list of the nation's largest black businesses, and we thank our customers for having the vision and openheartedness to partner with us," said Dennis Vinson , President/CEO, Signature Packaging. "Our growth and reputation are based on a commitment of producing quality products, competitive pricing along with excellent customer service, talented employees and family values," he added.
In April, 2007, Signature Packaging began production in the newly built 80,000 plus square foot manufacturing facility (with capacity to expand another 160,000 square feet) after relocating the company from the Atlanta area, which was established in 2003. With potential to expand the facility, neighboring St. Louis and Memphis and associations with large integrated companies throughout the country, Vinson sees domestic and international growth opportunities moving forward.
About
Signature Packaging & Paper, LLC headquartered in Jackson, MO , is a full service corrugated (boxes) manufacturer. The company manufactures corrugated boxes, point of purchase displays, CAD design, testing lab and warehousing. Independently or through associations with large integrated companies throughout the country, Signature services a wide variety of national, regional and local customers including Procter & Gamble Company, Rubbermaid, STERIS Corporation, etc. ( www.signaturepackaging.net )
